nodes.description: 1990年Mohammad Afzal被走私至印度
nodes.support_text: Mohammad Afzal was smuggled into India in 1990 and subsequently brought to Delhi by Shaukat Hussain.

nodes.description: 2001年2月Tariq联系Afzal加入Jaish-e-Mohammad
nodes.support_text: In February 2001, Afzal was contacted by Tariq, a close associate of Ghazi Baba, a supreme commander of Jaish-e-Mohammed...

nodes.description: 2001年12月第一周策划袭击议会大厦
nodes.support_text: Mr Sharma said the conspiracy was going on for the past three months, and meetings were conducted at different places in the Capital, the plan to launch attacks on Parliament was hatched in the first week of December.

nodes.description: 2001年12月15日逮捕Gilani并获取关键线索
nodes.support_text: Breakthrough came through Delhi College lecturer Plan hatched in first week of December.

nodes.description: 2001年12月16日发布逮捕Mohammad Afzal等四名嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: All the four accused persons have been remanded in police custody for seven days for further interrogation.

nodes.description: 恐怖分子通过议会大厦 gate No.2 进入并发动袭击
nodes.support_text: All attackers were Pakistanis Breakthrough came through Delhi College lecturer Plan hatched in first week of December.

nodes.description: 袭击前临时改变计划从机场袭击改为议会大厦
nodes.support_text: Mr Sharma said they initially planned to launch attacks on the airport, but they changed the idea at the last minute and attacked Parliament.

nodes.description: 2001年12月16日确认五名袭击者均为巴基斯坦籍
nodes.support_text: All the slain militants had entered the Parliament complex through Gate No 2...

nodes.description: 通过Gilani线人获取Shaukat Hussain藏匿地址
nodes.support_text: Gilani also told the police that Afzal and Shaukat (Afzal's cousin), with whom Afzal was staying in Mukherji Nagar...

nodes.description: 2001年12月16日从Shaukat家逮捕Navjot Sandhu及其同伙
nodes.support_text: The officials immediately raided Shaukat's house, they picked up his wife Navjot Sandhu and she disclosed that she was aware of their plans...

nodes.description: 2001年12月13日袭击中五名恐怖分子全部被击毙
nodes.support_text: The Delhi Police said the militants were getting instructions from across the border, but ruled out any overseas link.

nodes.description: 确认袭击者携带AK步枪、手枪、爆炸物等装备
nodes.support_text: All attackers were Pakistanis Breakthrough came through Delhi College lecturer Plan hatched in first week of December.

nodes.description: 2001年12月16日警方披露袭击者国际遥控指挥细节
nodes.support_text: He said the militants were getting instructions from across the border, but ruled out any overseas link.

nodes.description: 关联1999年印航IC-814劫机案中的Baba身份
nodes.support_text: Afzal identified the hijacker as Mohammad, alias Baba.

nodes.description: 德里警察局长声明整个行动由Jaish-e-Mohammad实施
nodes.support_text: 德里警察局长声明整个行动由Jaish-e-Mohammad实施

nodes.description: Jaish-e-Mohammad实施整个行动
nodes.support_text: Jaish-e-Mohammad实施整个行动

nodes.description: 明确排除第六人参与行动
nodes.support_text: 明确排除第六人参与行动

nodes.description: 他们计划实施轰动事件
nodes.support_text: 他们计划实施轰动事件

nodes.description: Ghazi Baba声称Shaukat等人参与德里自杀式袭击阴谋
nodes.support_text: Ghazi Baba claimed Shaukat and others were involved in the德里 suicide attack plot

nodes.description: 其他成员加入小组
nodes.support_text: Several others joined the group

nodes.description: 警方将他们带到甘地广场藏身处
nodes.support_text: Police took them to Gandhi Nagar hideout

nodes.description: Rana和Hamza加入小组
nodes.support_text: Rana and Hamza joined the group

nodes.description: Rana和Hamza在2001年12月来德里
nodes.support_text: Rana and Hamza arrived in Delhi in December 2001

nodes.description: 他们购买了一辆雅马哈摩托车
nodes.support_text: They purchased a Yamaha motorcycle

nodes.description: 他们购买了手机、SIM卡等物品
nodes.support_text: They bought mobile phones, SIM cards, etc.

nodes.description: 他们获取了停车标签贴纸
nodes.support_text: They obtained parking stickers
